pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mysocketctl: a CLI tool for Mysocket.io ==================================================Mysocketctl is a CLI wrapper around the Mysocket.io APIPlease check the full documentation here:`mysocketctl documentation on readthedocs.io <https://mysocket.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mysocketctl/mysocket.html#>`_Installation--------------------:: pip3 install mysocketctlAuthors--------------------* Andree ToonkLinks--------------------* `mysocketctl documentation on readthedocs.io <https://mysocket.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mysocketctl/mysocket.html#>`_* `Mysocket home page <https://mysocket.io/>`_* `Project home page (GitHub) <https://github.com/mysocketio/mysocketctl>`_Bugs--------------------Please report bugs, issues, feature requests, etc. on `GitHub <https://github.com/mysocketio/mysocketctl/issues>`_.
